# CreatorHelper.CreatePropertyKeyFromArguments method

Returns the property key for a given leaf and property name.

```csharp
public static IPropertyKey CreatePropertyKeyFromArguments(string leafName, string propertyName)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| leafName | Target leaf name |
| propertyName | Property name to recover |

## Return Value

An instance that implements a IPropertyKey interface that represents the key of property.
